Reviews Review by - Yelp Lisa C.: Enjoyed a cold beer then hubby had the bratwurst sandwich that he loved. I had blue plate pot roast special that was delicious. Nice sized portions of food and good atmosphere Review by - Yelp Michelle S.: Loved Genes for a delicious beer, welcoming atmosphere and the crawfish salad (the jalapeño vinegarette ) it was a fun few hours and I got some help with the days Wordle Review by - Yelp Sarah S.: Delicious food and a hefty beer list. Was difficult to decide! My Avondale burger didn't need any ketchup or mustard...my mouth is watering just thinking about it.. Review by - Yelp Jay W.: This place is great! The food and drinks are out of this world! Can't wait to come back. Best Bloody Mary I have ever had! Great music too! Review by - Yelp Amanda J.: My 5 year old says this is his favorite restaurant. Us adults love it because we have a choice of many craft beers, cocktails, and our favorite- Jameson. The kids enjoy the small arcade area. Bartenders are fun and helpful. Best dive bar around!
